document.full_text: global economic recovery is on track, helped by a stronger united states, but threats ranging from high oil prices to european sovereign debt crises could yet combine to create a bout of stagflation, the oecd said on wednesday.
document.title: oecd sees growth firm, but risks abounding
lines_and_colors: global economic recovery is on track, helped by a stronger united states, but threats ranging from high oil prices to european sovereign debt crises could yet combine to create a bout of stagflation, the oecd said on wednesday.
